reviewText: I bought 3 Little Bear DVDs.  Poor quality.  Would not buy more.  These are more the quality dollar stores used to sell.
I love Little Bear and all that the stories.  They send a good message in manners and how to care about others.
This is an awesome video for kids. My 1 year old loves them. It ships right away. Little bear plays music in the back ground as it has little topics. There is more then one show.

I have always loved these Little Bear episodes on NickJr. It's one of the only genuinely sweet shows left on TV for kids. I like this array of episodes on this disk. I also purchased Feel Better Little Bear, Grandmothers House, Halloween and Rainy Day tales. You should purchase a bunch of these DVD episode sets (each one has 10 shows on them). I'll probably end up buying more to collect them all! P.S. It's better to buy the used versions... half the price usually and same quality!
Little Bear's wish -- Lucy's okay -- Lucy needs a friend -- Winter wonderland -- Diva Hen -- I'll be you, you'll be me -- Puddle jumper -- April Fool -- Balloon heads -- Hat parade.
